resources.string:
Use the "New Task" button to add a New Task in the Task page
 Select a task and long click to update or delete the task
 Use the drop-down list on the top of the task page to filter tasks by user or user group

Add a new resource using the "Add" button 
 Delete a resource using by selecting and long-clicking the resource you would like to delete
 Use the drop-down list on the top of the resource page to filter resource by user group
Select a user and long-click to update the user\n
Click on a date in the calendar page to view a list of chores due on the selected month\n
